subject: Solar Panel Installation Quote
description: Need a quote for installing solar panels on my 2000 sq ft home

subject: System Performance Issues
description: My solar panels are producing less energy than expected

content: Hello, I noticed my solar production has dropped by 30% compared to last month. Can you help?
I'll look into your system performance right away. Can you confirm if you've noticed any physical changes to the panels?
No physical changes that I can see, but we did have some cloudy weather

subject: Billing Discrepancy
description: My energy bill doesn't reflect the solar credits correctly

content: Hi, I've reviewed my latest energy bill and the solar credits seem lower than usual
I'll check your production data and compare it with the billing cycle. Give me a moment.
I found the issue - there was a delay in reporting your production data. I'll contact the utility company.

subject: Warranty Claim
description: One panel has visible damage after recent storm

content: I discovered damage to one of my panels after last night's storm. Attaching photos.
I'm sorry to hear about the damage. I've reviewed the photos and this should be covered under warranty. I'll schedule an inspection.
I'd like to schedule a cleaning service for my panels. They're getting dusty.
We have availability next week. Would Tuesday or Thursday morning work for you?

subject: Battery Backup Installation
description: Interested in adding battery backup to existing system

subject: Inverter Error Message
description: Getting error code E-034 on my inverter display

content: My inverter is showing error E-034. System is not producing power.
This error typically indicates a grid voltage issue. Have you noticed any power fluctuations?
It's time for my annual system check. When can we schedule this?
I can schedule you for next Wednesday at 10 AM. Would that work?
Yes, that works perfectly. Thank you!
Great! I've confirmed your appointment. See you then.
I'm unable to log into the monitoring app since this morning.
Let's try to troubleshoot. Have you tried clearing your app cache?

subject: Energy Usage Report
description: Need detailed production report for tax purposes

content: I need my annual production report for tax filing.
I'll generate that report right away. Would you like it in PDF format?
Yes, PDF would be perfect.
I've attached the report. Let me know if you need anything else!

subject: Grid Connection Issue
description: System not feeding back to grid

content: My system isn't sending power back to the grid according to my meter.
I'll check your system remotely. Can you confirm if your system is showing as active?
Yes, the system shows as active but the meter isn't moving.

subject: Solar Panel Upgrade
description: Want to add more panels to existing system

content: Looking to expand my system by 4-6 panels. Is this possible?
I'll review your current setup and check roof space availability.

subject: Mobile App Feature Request
description: Would like to see daily energy graphs in the mobile app

content: I think it would be really helpful to have daily energy production graphs in the mobile app

subject: Installation Timeline Question
description: When can installation begin after permit approval?

content: Just got my permit approved, wondering about next steps and timeline
Congratulations on the permit approval! I'll check our installation team's schedule and get back to you with specific dates.

subject: Power Outage Behavior
description: System shut down during power outage

content: We had a power outage and my system completely shut down. I thought it would still work?
Without a battery backup system, solar panels will shut down during grid outages for safety. Would you like to discuss backup options?

subject: Tax Credit Documentation
description: Need documentation for federal tax credit

content: Can you provide the necessary documentation for claiming the federal solar tax credit?
With winter approaching, should I be worried about snow covering the panels?
Our panels are designed to handle snow load, but I'll share some winter maintenance tips and monitoring recommendations.

subject: Rate Plan Optimization
description: Need help choosing best utility rate plan

content: My utility offers several rate plans for solar customers. Which would be best for my usage pattern?

subject: Shading Analysis Request
description: Trees growing near panels causing shade

content: The trees in my neighbor's yard have grown quite tall and I think they're affecting my panel performance
I'll schedule a drone inspection to analyze the shading impact and provide recommendations.
There are pigeons nesting under my solar panels. Will this cause any issues?
Yes, this can be problematic. We can install critter guards to prevent nesting while maintaining ventilation.
How much would that cost and how long would installation take?

subject: Meter Reading Discrepancy
description: Smart meter readings don't match app

content: The production numbers in my app are different from my smart meter readings
Let me check the data streams from both sources. There might be a sync delay.
We just had a severe hailstorm. Should I be concerned about damage to my panels?
Panel #7 is showing no production for the last 3 days
I can see the issue in our monitoring system. Looks like the microinverter needs replacement.
My system is producing 15% less than the guaranteed amount this quarter
I'll analyze your production data and weather patterns to verify the shortfall.
How much would it cost to get my panels cleaned? There's a lot of pollen buildup.
Planning to get an electric vehicle. Will my current system handle the additional load?
I'll review your current system size and usage patterns to determine if an expansion is needed.
My solar monitoring system shows offline in the app since yesterday
Let's check if it's a connection issue. Can you verify if the gateway LED is green?
The LED is blinking red
That indicates a lost WiFi connection. Has your home network name or password changed recently?
Yes, we did change our WiFi password!
I noticed water stains on my ceiling near where the solar panels are mounted
This requires immediate attention. I'll schedule an emergency inspection for tomorrow morning.
Thank you! What time should I expect the inspector?
The inspector will arrive between 8-10 AM. Please provide access to both the roof and attic if possible.
My battery is only holding 60% of its original capacity after 2 years
I'll check your battery's performance data and warranty status
According to our records, this is covered under warranty. Would you like to proceed with a replacement?
My HOA requires detailed documentation for solar installation approval
I'll prepare a comprehensive package including visual renderings and technical specifications

subject: Emergency Shutdown Help
description: Need to shut down system for firefighters

content: Firefighters need to access our roof. How do I shut down the system?
I'll guide you through the rapid shutdown procedure right now
First, locate the red emergency switch near your inverter
Found it and switched it off. Anything else?
Also turn off the solar supply main breaker in your electrical panel. Let me know when done.
I heard our state is offering rebates for adding battery storage. Can you help me apply?
Yes! The program just launched. Let me check your system's eligibility and get the paperwork started.
Need panels temporarily removed for roof repair next month
I can coordinate with your roofer. Please share their contact info and planned repair dates.
